statements: SELECT * FROM activity_log;
SELECT player_id, login_timestamp, logout_timestamp FROM activity_log;
SELECT player_id FROM activity_log WHERE logout_timestamp IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM activity_log WHERE player_id = 12345;
SELECT login_timestamp, logout_timestamp FROM activity_log WHERE player_id = 54321;
SELECT player_id, login_timestamp, logout_timestamp FROM activity_log WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, login_timestamp, logout_timestamp FROM activity_log WHERE logout_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY login_timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_logins FROM activity_log GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_logins > 10;
SELECT player_id, login_timestamp FROM activity_log WHERE login_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY login_timestamp, player_id;
SELECT player_id, MAX(logout_timestamp) AS latest_logout FROM activity_log GROUP BY player_id HAVING latest_logout <= '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM player_activity_log WHERE player_id = 123;
SELECT player_id, username FROM player WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM player_activity_log ORDER BY login_timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS login_count FROM player_activity_log GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player.*, player_activity_log.login_timestamp FROM player INNER JOIN player_activity_log ON player.player_id = player_activity_log.player_id;
SELECT * FROM player_activity_log WHERE player_id = 12345;
SELECT player_id, login_timestamp FROM player_activity_log WHERE logout_timestamp < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY login_timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_id, username FROM player INNER JOIN player_activity_log ON player.player_id = player_activity_log.player_id WHERE logout_timestamp IS NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_players FROM player_activity_log;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM player_activity_log GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY total_logs DESC;
SELECT * FROM activity_log
SELECT player_id, login_timestamp FROM activity_log WHERE logout_timestamp IS NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sessions FROM sessions
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM players WHERE player_id = 123
SELECT session_id, player_id, session_start, session_end FROM sessions ORDER BY session_start DESC
SELECT * FROM players WHERE player_name = 'Alice';
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM players WHERE player_id = 123;
SELECT session_id, session_start, session_end FROM sessions WHERE player_id = 456 ORDER BY session_start DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_email FROM players WHERE player_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT player_id, player_name, login_timestamp, logout_timestamp FROM activity_log JOIN players ON activity_log.player_id = players.player_id ORDER BY login_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM player
SELECT username FROM player
SELECT id, username FROM player ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT player_id, login_timestamp FROM login WHERE player_id = 1
SELECT player_id, action, timestamp FROM activity_log ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM player WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, username FROM player ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT player.username, login.login_timestamp FROM player JOIN login ON player.id = login.player_id WHERE player.id >= 5 ORDER BY login.login_timestamp ASC;
SELECT player.username, COUNT(*) as total_logins FROM player JOIN login ON player.id = login.player_id GROUP BY player.username HAVING total_logins > 10;
SELECT player.username, COUNT(*) as num_logouts FROM player LEFT JOIN logout ON player.id = logout.player_id GROUP BY player.username ORDER BY num_logouts DESC, player.username ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_logs;
SELECT player_name FROM player WHERE player_id = 123;
SELECT log_description, log_timestamp FROM player_logs WHERE player_id = 456;
SELECT player_name, log_description FROM player_logs JOIN player ON player_logs.player_id = player.player_id;
SELECT player_name, log_timestamp FROM player_logs JOIN player ON player_logs.player_id = player.player_id WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_name, player_id FROM player WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player WHERE player_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM activity_log WHERE player_id = 3 ORDER BY login_timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player JOIN player_logs ON player.player_id = player_logs.player_id WHERE log_timestamp >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_logins FROM activity_log GROUP BY player_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_logins DESC;
